description: This course will familiarize students with the major theories that underpin the counselling profession and that inform the counselling relationship. Students will be expected to demonstrate a thorough knowledge of the history and theoretical development of counselling, understanding the principles and practices behind the major models of practice. This course is taught in weekly workshop format.
restricted: Restricted to students in MCouns, DPsych, MAppSc, GCSocWk, GDipSocWk, MSocWk, MPsychSport&Ex, MPsychClin, MAppPsych, DClinPsych, or MMusThy
